Name: Requiring the department of environmental protection to post information online regarding scheduled and requested infrastructure services
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of environmental protection to post information online regarding scheduled and requested infrastructure services
BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts
